data.title: Signature Entertainment
data.meta_description: This Oscar nominated political White House thriller stars Gary Oldman, Jeff Bridges, Sam Elliot, Christian Slater and Joan Allen. We follow a senior Senator, who is contending for the US Vice Presidency – and her fall from grace after accusations about her past surface. Described as a “modern political masterpiece” and “a flawless thriller that […]
data.text: This Oscar nominated political White House thriller stars Gary Oldman, Jeff Bridges, Sam Elliot, Christian Slater and Joan Allen. We follow a senior Senator, who is contending for the US Vice Presidency – and her fall from grace after accusations about her past surface. Described as a “modern political masterpiece” and “a flawless thriller that educates and entertains all at the same time.
